nodes.text: California wildfires have become unpredictable and extreme
nodes.notes: New terminology invented: firenado, gigafire, fire siege, fire pandemic. Wildfire season is now year-round due to recurring droughts.

nodes.text: coastal vegetation is often parched enough to burn without wind
nodes.notes: Previously, Southern California's coastal fires had to be driven by desert winds, but vegetation along the usually moist coast is now so dry it doesn't need winds to fan wildfires
